newsitem.title: UK: Weir rises to 6-week high after results.
newsitem.headline: Weir rises to 6-week high after results.

text.p: Shares in Weir Group Plc shot up to a six-week high on Wednesday after the UK engineering concern posted record profits for 1996 and expressed confidence going forward, dealers said.
At 1118 GMT, the shares were up 23-1/2p to 241.
Weir announced pre-tax profits for the year ended December 27 of 49 million stg as margins improved, and raised the dividend by 6.7 percent to 8p per share.
Looking ahead, the company said there were plenty of opportunities even though conditions remained competitive nFLLFGJ32R.
"The figures were good ... better than anyone expected," said one dealer. "It had been a dull market leading up to the figures."
The shares, added another dealer, "were due for a bounce."
